sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>thread</radical>s a <radical>criminal</radical> wears will always be <kanji>scarlet</kanji>. Scarlet is the color of freshly spilt blood, which is why bad guys wear it so much.
meaningInfo: Picture a person wearing all scarlet all the time. Don't they give you a criminal-y vibe?
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>scarlet</kanji> color holds a lot of <reading>he</reading>at (<ja>ひ</ja>). Scarlet is the color of fire, and it has the heat of fire too.
readingInfo: Picture a criminal, covered in this scarlet thread, heat radiating off of him.
